Package school.management.system.data

package school.management.system.data
This package contains classes and interfaces for handling data operations within the school management system, including database interactions and data persistence.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    school.management.system
    This package contains classes and interfaces for managing a school system, including user interface components, data handling, and model representations.
    school.management.system.model
    This package contains the model classes for the School Management System.
    school.management.system.service
    This package contains the service classes for the School Management System.
    school.management.system.ui
    This package contains the user interface components for the School Management System.
    school.management.system.util
    Utility classes for the School Management System.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    DataService
    Handles business logic for data operations like searching, deleting, and fetching.
    DataSource
    Manages the database connection pool using HikariCP.
    DB
    Handles database operations such as connecting, querying, inserting, and updating records.
